name: Azylum
description:
Azylum is a first-person survival-horror game in which you are trapped in an unknown asylum, with no possible way to escape. You have plenty of weapons, but limited ammo and health packs. Will you Survive? Or will you perish?

Important Controls:

F- To use flashlight (infinite)

SHIFT-Run

Note:

Azylum is currently in Beta 0.1.7 and will be continually updated free of charge for players who purchase the game. I am planning on adding a plethora of new stuff in the future.

Your purchase will help improve the game, since I am a single developer with limited resources :)
